comment: Template for creating site-specific adapters. Copy this structure and customize for each directory site.
name: Example Directory

selectors.comment: CSS selectors for extracting contact information

card.comment: Selector for individual contact cards or listings

name.comment: Selector for person's name within a card

revealButton.comment: Button that reveals hidden contact info (for Click Handler Scraper)

profileLink.comment: Link to individual profile page (for Profile Resolver Scraper)

pagination.comment_type: Options: numbered, next-button, load-more, infinite-scroll, url-pattern, api

pageNumbers.comment: Selector for page number links (for numbered pagination)

urlPattern.comment: URL pattern for direct page navigation

waitForSelector.comment: Wait for this selector before extracting

clickToReveal.comment: Whether to click buttons to reveal contact info

navigateToProfile.comment: Whether to navigate to individual profiles

validation.comment_required: At least one of these fields must be present

performance.comment_batch: Number of cards to process before checking memory
performance.comment_maxPages: Maximum number of pages to scrape (safety limit)

notes: This is a template file showing the structure of site-specific adapters
Copy this file to create a new adapter for a specific website
Rename the file to match the domain (e.g., 'linkedin-adapter.json')
Test your adapter with a small limit first (--limit 10)
Optional fields can be omitted if not applicable
